  <description>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b7c929eb-227d-11d8-89de-faf1df86d935#1#12</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Afrika a gyarmatosítás előtt</string>
            <string language="en">Africa before the colonization</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Afrika vor der Besiedlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Afrique avant la colonisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">África antes da colonização</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Africa prima della colonizzazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφρική πριν από την αποίκιση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">África antes de la colonización</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Afrika részeinek áttekintő bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">The overview introduction of the parts of Africa</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Az Európán kívüli világ,  Egyiptom,  kultúra,  </string>
            <string language="en">the world beyond Europe, Egypt, culture</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Überblickeinleitung der Teile von Afrika</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'introduction de vue d'ensemble des régions de 
l'Afrique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A introdução da vista geral das partes de 
África</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'introduzione di descrizione delle zone 
dell'Africa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εισαγωγή επισκόπησης των μερών της Αφρικής</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La introducción de la descripción de las partes 
de África</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Welt über Europa, Ägypten, Kultur hinaus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le monde au delà de l'Europe, Egypte, culture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o mundo além de Europa, Egipto, cultura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il mondo oltre Europa, Egitto, coltura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ο κόσμος πέρα από την Ευρώπη, Αίγυπτος, πολιτισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el mundo más allá de Europa, Egipto, cultura</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>

        <metaMetadata>
